snippet: Nicole Jeray’s life has been anything but typical since 1996, when she was found to have narcolepsy. But she has persisted since her 1994 rookie season on the L.P.G.A. Tour.
abstract: Golfer Nicole Jeray suffers from narcolepsy, condition that causes chronic sleepiness, but refuses to let it stop from competing; is now 45 years old and went to LPGA annual qualifying tournament for 22nd year, competing against field that included 21 players younger than 22.
lead_paragraph: Nicole Jeray’s life has been anything but typical since 1996, when she was found to have narcolepsy. But she has persisted since her 1994 rookie season on the L.P.G.A. Tour.

headline.main: A Golfer Learns to Carry On While Coping With a Sleep Disorder
headline.print_headline: A Lesson in Carrying On a Career While Coping With a Sleep Disorder
